org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.buffer

类 Buffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.buffer.Buffer

  • public class Buffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for pooled MemorySegment instances.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private int currentSize
      The current size of the buffer in the range from 0 (inclusive) to the size of the backing MemorySegment (inclusive).
      private boolean isBuffer 
      private MemorySegment memorySegment
      The backing MemorySegment instance
      private java.lang.Object recycleLock 
      private BufferRecycler recycler
      The recycler for the backing MemorySegment
      private int referenceCount
      The current number of references to this buffer
